ajmc.olr.layoutlm package#

Submodules#

ajmc.olr.layoutlm.draw module#

Draw utilities, notably to draw word labels.

ajmc.olr.layoutlm.draw.draw_caption(img: PIL.Image, labels_to_colors: Dict[str, Tuple[int, int, int]], font_dir: str | None = None)[source]#
ajmc.olr.layoutlm.draw.draw_page_labels(img: PIL.Image, words: List[OcrWord], labels: List[str], labels_to_colors)[source]#

Highlights words bounding boxes with the color corresponding to their label.

ajmc.olr.layoutlm.layoutlm module#

ajmc.olr.layoutlm.layoutlm.align_predicted_page(page: Page, rois, labels_to_ids, ids_to_labels, regions_to_coarse_labels, tokenizer, feature_extractor, model, unknownify_tokens: bool = False, text_only: bool = False) → Tuple[List[Word], List[str]][source]#
ajmc.olr.layoutlm.layoutlm.create_olr_config(json_path: Path, prefix: str)[source]#
ajmc.olr.layoutlm.layoutlm.draw_pages(pages, rois, labels_to_ids, ids_to_labels, regions_to_coarse_labels, tokenizer, feature_extractor, model, output_dir: str, unknownify_tokens: bool = False, text_only: bool = False)[source]#
ajmc.olr.layoutlm.layoutlm.get_data_dict_pages(data_dict: Dict[str, List[Dict[str, str]]], sampling: Dict[str, float] | None = None) → Dict[str, List[CanonicalPage]][source]#
Parameters:

  • data_dict – A dict of format {'set': [{'id': 'comm_id_1', 'run':..., 'path': ...}, ...] }

  • sampling – A dict of format {'set': sample_size} with 0>sample_size>1.

ajmc.olr.layoutlm.layoutlm.main(config)[source]#
ajmc.olr.layoutlm.layoutlm.normalize_bounding_box(bbox: Tuple[Tuple[int, int], Tuple[int, int]], img_width: int, img_height: int)[source]#
ajmc.olr.layoutlm.layoutlm.page_to_layoutlm_encodings(page, rois, labels_to_ids, regions_to_coarse_labels, tokenizer, feature_extractor: FeatureExtractor, get_labels: bool = True, text_only: bool = False, unknownify_tokens: bool = False)[source]#
ajmc.olr.layoutlm.layoutlm.prepare_data(page_sets: Dict[str, List[OcrPage]], labels_to_ids: Dict[str, int], regions_to_coarse_labels: Dict[str, str], rois: List[str], tokenizer, feature_extractor, unknownify_tokens: bool = False, text_only: bool = False, do_debug: bool = False) → Dict[str, CustomDataset][source]#

Prepares data for LayoutLMV2.

Parameters:

  • page_sets – A dict containing a list of OcrPages per split.

  • labels_to_ids – A dict mapping label-names to their respective ids, e.g. {{"cat":0, "dog":1, ...}}.

  • regions_to_coarse_labels –

  • rois – The regions to focus on

  • tokenizer –

  • unknownify_tokens –

  • do_debug –
